divs: sighting detailsthe 6 june 2010, france and canada were trying to make official open contact with our extraterrestrial visitors. in t���opolis, aix-en-provence, france while the coordinator of this civil initiave was speaking a bright flash appeared in the sky. meanwhile in canada, at 22h00 it was rainy, after the sunset it was a grey sky and clouds. a bright blue light appeared behind the clouds it was very beautifull to watch such a blue light with all those grey clouds and rain. after the event, i watched all over the internet to find if others spacecrafts appear in other places around the world (6 june 2010). in london, 3 white orbs in triangular formation was filmed in rome, the same triangular formation was also seen and filmed by some military. the video was broadcast in a italian television station. i can't say if there's a link between the the world extraterrestrial contact movement and those sightings, but i wanted to share with you. ufo ovni triangle frmation london uk 6th june 2010 http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=3tkra_jlzao&translated=1 ufo su roma: filmato dei militari - 6\06\2010 http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=ztitrmqgupo&translated=1 world extraterrestrial contact http:\\www.antollma.com\ ps: next worldwide meeting... 6 june 2011, we are looking for others ambassador of their own country to make official contact with extraterrestrials.... is there any leaders in the room?
Summary: 3 White Orbs Triangle Formation (London and Rome) World Extraterrestrial Contact
